3.18.25  1:58 pm   I just realized I'm pretty ill mentally and decided that I'll book a psychiatrist appointment. Any word of encouragement? Cause hell I am scared

Â Â Â Â Â  the magical thing about appointments is how much you learn about them when you are actually there, and how ABSOLUTELY NOTHING you could ever know about them, before you've gone yet. cherish this phenomenon

Â Â Â Â Â  don't be silly, i am making some right now

Â Â Â Â Â  can i make the wave. i am a control freak, please let me make the wave

3.18.25  8:32 am   why is it that, when we construct the set of real numbers using Dedekind cuts of the set of rational numbers, we can take for granted the fact that integers and rational numbers exist? why do the reals and their irrational members need so much additional vetting to get let into the party? if i were the reals, i would be offended and irritated.

Â Â Â Â Â  i must confess i have not been following the Dedekind saga

3.18.25  7:52 am   did it rain yet?

Â Â Â Â Â  yes it did but it will rain more

3.18.25  7:24 am   Have you ever built an empire?

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe without noticing it

3.18.25  3:37 am   Do you have any advice on how to not be controlling when collaborating with others on art?

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe if you have another chance separately to do your own projects, you can feel reassured that you'll have an outlet for that, so then you'll feel more able to let go even if the collabo slips totally into the control of the other person. you'll still have your own thing, separately

3.18.25  2:18 am   Is this page like a guestbook of sorts?

Â Â Â Â Â  i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

Â Â Â Â Â  to call it by that name, you'll wanna go to united states, canada, or the caribbean

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe but i'm not always a very good listener at those times

3.17.25  11:38 pm   what would you do if you suddenly forgot how to play piano

Â Â Â Â Â  start finding a new way, which if course is the desired way to play. certainly if you are trying to remember 'how to play' youre gonna sound like crap

Â Â Â Â Â  right here

Â Â Â Â Â  i still haven't fully got the hang of it yet

Â Â Â Â Â  the whole website is a secret

3.17.25  3:28 pm   would you make an album ? or does that not suit the way you make music ? and do you see inherent advantages to making album compared to what you have done so far ? i can wait to see what you're gonna do next and i'll start doing that when i find the time

Â Â Â Â Â  there's a lot of things i could do. heck, i feel as if i've barely even started living

3.17.25  2:49 pm   name dropping feels so weird/like a big deal because you're basically invoking something enormous (what the name is referring to) with a couple of syllables. people, books, albums, events, etc.

Â Â Â Â Â  and of course to compensate for that high density of meaning, you have to pronounce the name much more slowly and accurately than the rest of the sentence

3.17.25  2:47 pm   Do you learn any other languages than English and Dutch?

Â Â Â Â Â  i'm trying to push hard through french and spanish. making good progress, but as always it's a long road

3.17.25  2:28 pm   What is a joke?

Â Â Â Â Â  nothing. it's literally nothing

3.17.25  2:12 pm   how much is one trillion?

Â Â Â Â Â  in the old days, 1 billion. still to this day in the netherlands 1 biljeon

3.17.25  11:35 am   what has been the longest gap between the first writing stage and final production stage of a song/vid thus far?

Â Â Â Â Â  about 10 years. i had an entire verse of 'here comes the sun' written in august 2010. although it got some slight changes later

Â Â Â Â Â  i'm not totally following your logic here

3.17.25  10:44 am   Do you view those of us who use traditional capitalization as old fashioned?

Â Â Â Â Â  to be honest, this day and age it makes you look just ever so slightly more like a bot than you perhaps otherwise could have

3.17.25  10:33 am   are there any objective metrics by which to judge how good or bad music is or is it truly entirely subjective?

Â Â Â Â Â there's no way to predict or explain which piece of music (or any artistic medium) will work for one person or another

     i tend to think there are at least some objective qualities that make music good or bad, because there is an infinite amount of noises you can make which everyone will agree is not good music

Â Â Â Â Â  context, context, context

3.17.25  9:36 am   hi bill, question, is there ever a time you've had burnout for months? or even found yourself with no ideas left?

Â Â Â Â Â absolutely not. i am still in all-hands-on-deck mode in an ever-prayerful attempt to maybe capture the emergency level quantities at stake

     you're a big inspiration to me !

Â Â Â Â Â

3.17.25  7:48 am   have you ever abandoned a song idea because you just couldn't make it work?

Â Â Â Â Â  i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.17.25  6:47 am   Sometimes I want to just say how I really feel. To actual people instead of in my imagination only. Just be brutally honest. Positive and negative. Everything. So my mind isn't so overloaded and isolated.
But how I really feel changes every 5 minutes. And both communication and people cannot keep up with that.

Â Â Â Â Â my goodness are you in for a thrilling surprise

      So here I am, not knowing what to do

Â Â Â Â Â  might as well dive headfirst into the wild world of improvisation

3.17.25  6:39 am   I cannot imagine you feeling an emotion that isn't :l... like... do you laugh?

Â Â Â Â Â  wait but my feeling about you is the exact same. but yes i laugh probably too often. Ah, perhaps if we drill down to a deeper problem perhaps it's that i do too much scripted content, which is an ironic shame considering how much i cherish unscripted content

Â Â Â Â Â walk through the door

     What's the most takes you've done for a single part?

Â Â Â Â Â i don't recall

Â Â Â Â Â no

     Have you had musical ideas that you didn't have the chops to perform?

Â Â Â Â Â no

Â Â Â Â Â no

3.16.25  11:50 pm   Do you ever find satisfaction in buckets?

Â Â Â Â Â  that doesn't ring a bell but i'm sure i've done it at some point. yes i was writing a song and about halfway through the first verse it suddenly became very satisfying to use the word 'buckets' and see where that leads me
